item.title: Masters Fantasy Golf Tournament Dashboard in R
item.description: This blog posts shows how I use the cronR package to automate a fantasy golf pool with some friends for the golf major tournaments. The process takes four steps: Collect the leader board data Prepare the data Publish the data to GoogleSheets Automate the script with cronR Lets use the 2022 Masters tournament as an example of how we set up the pipeline.
